name: JumpJet Rex

files.game: N/A: Please select the *.zip downloaded from https://www.humblebundle.com

content:
files:
- game: 'N/A: Please select the *.zip downloaded from https://www.humblebundle.com'
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/start.sh
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    format: zip
    src: $game
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/sh

      if (uname -m | grep "64"); then

      arch="x86_64";

      else

      arch="x86";

      fi;

      ./JumpJetRex.$arch

      '
    file: $GAMEDIR/start.sh
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/start.sh
